es.ull.isaatc.simulation.sequential.flow
Class ANDJoinFlow

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.isaatc.simulation.sequential.SimulationObject
      es.ull.isaatc.simulation.sequential.flow.BasicFlow
          es.ull.isaatc.simulation.sequential.flow.SingleSuccessorFlow
              es.ull.isaatc.simulation.sequential.flow.MergeFlow
                  es.ull.isaatc.simulation.sequential.flow.ANDJoinFlow
All Implemented Interfaces:
ANDJoinFlow, FinalizerFlow, Flow, JoinFlow, MergeFlow, SingleSuccessorFlow, Identifiable, SimulationObject, java.lang.Comparable<SimulationObject>
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiscriminatorFlow, PartialJoinFlow, SynchronizationFlow, ThreadMergeFlow
public abstract class ANDJoinFlow
extends MergeFlow
implements ANDJoinFlow

A merge flow which allows only one of the incoming branches to pass. Which one passes depends on the acceptValue.

Author:
Iván Castilla Rodríguez

          The number of branches which have to arrive to pass the control thread
